title: Yawn
review: It had a decent enough idea for a story, it... was... just... so... slow... I... would... have... fallen... asleep... if... it... hadn't... been... for... the... loud... overbearing... and... overly... dramatic... trying to sound like Vangelis score... And every time I've ever seen Jared Leto I feel like I'm watching someone acting.

title: Not into the comedic style...
review: Not for me, the movie would have been great without all the comedy. Trying to be a comedy while fighting Hela just didn't work for me. I prefer my superheroes to act like superheroes, not a bunch of goofballs. Leave the comedy to Deadpool...
